title: Jacket
description: likely woman\'s blue jacket with nipped waist and curved bottom; side opening with four sets of woven ties on PR; stand-up neck band has embroidered red facing; front and back bottom have partial and complete bands of multicolored embroidery and printed material; sleeves have four bands of cross stitch red and black on tan with brown overlaps; back has 8-1/2\" x 13-3/4\" rectangular red applique with tiny black and white appliques in geometric field
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
